plot outline: Led by the two different minded friends Ajay and Sanjay (Balacander and Gokul Raj), who have their own ethics, plan and goal in their life. Ajay wants to Plan his life and go along with it. But sanjay is an easy go person, he enjoys is life the way how it goes. Both are going meet with their love in their journey. The final conclusion is who is right in their path, Ajay or sanjay?
title: Mahanubhavaru
plot: Certain unfortunate incidents result in two best friends, Sanjay and Ajay, with contrasting opinions to part ways, before realising each other's value to reunite.

Led by the two different minded friends Ajay and Sanjay (Balacander and Gokul Raj), who have their own ethics, plan and goal in their life. Ajay wants to Plan his life and go along with it. But sanjay is an easy go person, he enjoys is life the way how it goes. Both are going meet with their love in their journey.
